name: OR_LNLG_INSTRUMENT
description: This table contains the Instruments information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The instrument type.

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_ID
columns.description: The instrument ID (SER).

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_FLASH_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether or not an instrument has been flash-sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_AUTCLVE_C_NAME
columns.description: The autoclave category number that was used to sterilize this instrument.

columns.name: FLSH_LOAD
columns.description: The load batch ID that this instrument was flash sterilized in.

columns.name: FLSH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the reason that this instrument was flash sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_VER_BY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the staff member who was responsible for verifying that this instrument was properly flash sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the result of this instruments flash sterilization process.

columns.name: FLSH_PRE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the reason this instrument was pre-released in the flash sterilization process.

columns.name: FLSH_CYCLE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the cycle type of the flash autoclave.

columns.name: FLSH_AUTCLVE_TEMP
columns.description: The category number of the temperature of the flash autoclave.

columns.name: FLSH_AUTCLVE_PRES
columns.description: The category number of the pressure of the flash autoclave.

columns.name: FLSH_PRES_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the unit of pressure of the flash autoclave.

columns.name: FLSH_DURATION
columns.description: The duration of time (in minutes) an item was flash sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date an instrument was sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_TIME
columns.description: This item stores the time an instrument was sterilized.

columns.name: FLSH_BIOL_RSLT_TIME
columns.description: This item stores the time a biological growth test was performed for sterile implants.

columns.name: INSTR_BARCODE_ID
columns.description: This item is used to document an instrument's barcode ID.

columns.name: FLSH_BIOL_RSLT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item is used to document the individual who called the results of a biological growth test that was performed for sterile implants.

columns.name: STERILIZATION_REFERENCE_NUM
columns.description: The sterilization reference number.

columns.name: STERILIZATION_EXP_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to store the sterilization expiration date of the equipment or instrument.
